# packages/ (auto-generated)

This folder contains per-room helper package files generated by `generate_witb_plus_actions_packages_templated.py`.

**Do not edit files here manually.** Re-run the generator to regenerate them.

```bash
python blueprints/automation/witb_plus_actions_lights_fan/v2/generate_witb_plus_actions_packages_templated.py \
  --rooms "Office" "Master Bathroom Toilet" \
  --template blueprints/automation/witb_plus_actions_lights_fan/v2/room_witb_actions_package_template.yaml \
  --out blueprints/automation/witb_plus_actions_lights_fan/v2/packages
```

Generated files define `input_boolean`, `timer`, `input_datetime`, and optional `input_number` tuning helpers for each room. Load them with:

```yaml
homeassistant:
  packages: !include_dir_merge_named packages/
```
